name: @parse_afni_name
author: AFNI Developers
description: A script to parse an AFNI name, outputting the path, prefix, view, and sub-brick selection string.

inputs.description: The AFNI name to be parsed
inputs.name: AFNI Name

output-files.description: Output path parsed from the AFNI name
output-files.name: Parsed Path

output-files.description: Output prefix parsed from the AFNI name
output-files.name: Parsed Prefix

output-files.description: Output view parsed from the AFNI name
output-files.name: Parsed View

output-files.description: Output sub-brick selection string parsed from the AFNI name
output-files.name: Parsed Sub-Brick
